name: Fae
insights: Fae is the only hero with Glittering Breath+.
Fae is the only hero with Glittering Breath.
Fae is the only hero with Def Res Bond 3.
Fae is the only hero with Def Res Bond 2.
Fae is the only hero with Def Res Bond 1.
Fae has the highest <abbr title="Resistance">RES</abbr> potential possible in Fire Emblem Heroes.
Fae has the highest <abbr title="Base Stat Total">BST</abbr> potential possible in Fire Emblem Heroes.
Fae has the highest <abbr title="Resistance">RES</abbr> potential possible among Armored heroes.
Fae has the highest <abbr title="Base Stat Total">BST</abbr> potential possible among Armored heroes.
Fae has the highest <abbr title="Resistance">RES</abbr> potential possible among Breath heroes.
Fae has the highest <abbr title="Base Stat Total">BST</abbr> potential possible among Breath heroes.
Fae has the highest <abbr title="Resistance">RES</abbr> potential possible among Green heroes.
Fae has the highest <abbr title="Base Stat Total">BST</abbr> potential possible among Green heroes.
description: A young dragon from Nabata village. Her excitement for her first winter festival cannot be contained. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

dialogue.text: Can I join in the festival? I've been very good, so give me a LOT of presents!
La, la, la! The town's all snowy! La, la, la! The snow's bright and white! It's festival time!
So...so pretty! There's no snow where I come from, so I'm having a lot of fun here!
They said that if I'm good, I'll get a present. You be good too!
There's SO much good food here! I'll get you some. Wait right here! I'll be back in a second.
I'm doing my very, very, very, VERY best for the winter festival!
Guess what! Right now, there's a winter festival going on over at <Friend Name>'s castle!
Everybody is so happy... I'm happy too!
What a nice gift! I'll remember this for a long time!

Hey, guess what! I got A LOT of presents from SO MANY people! Toys, books, shiny stones...all kinds of stuff! But you know what? What I like the best is seeing how happy everybody is. When everybody's smiling, it makes me smile too. I just feel so...so warm inside! You know, winter isn't cold—it's warm! Oooh, is it too early to start planning for next year's festival?
